english.segment1: I've been staring at the same wall for days. Ask me if I'm okay, I just may. I've been standing in the same spot for hours. I'll send you some flowers. You'll feel the same
english.segment2: No need to wake me I'm not sleeping. There's one thing I have to say
english.segment3: You're the one that took my breath away. You're the one that took my breath away. You're the one that took the time to ask if. Everything's okay.
english.segment4: I remember the times we don't belong. You'd sing us one more song. We'll go on
english.segment5: I remember the times we'd quit. I was tired of all of it. Nothing seemed to fit
english.segment6: No need to wake me I'm not sleeping. There's one thing I have to say
english.segment7: You're the one that took my breath away. You're the one that took my breath away. You're the one that took the time to ask if. Everything's okay.
